meta.content: COVID-19 AHCCCS and Coverage Resource for Employees & Student Families from a Nonprofit
Loss of Health Insurance – Where to Find Help Thousands of Arizonans are losing health insurance coverage or losing income and becoming AHCCCS, KidsC...

body.style: margin-top: 0; margin-right: 0; margin-bottom: 0; margin-left: 0; padding-top: 0; padding-right: 0; padding-bottom: 0; padding-left: 0; background-color: #DDEAFF;
body.p: Loss of Health Insurance – Where to Find Help Thousands of Arizonans are losing health insurance coverage or losing income and becoming AHCCCS, KidsC

p.style: mso-hide: all; font-size: 0px; background-color: transparent; position: absolute; height: 1px;

table.style: table-layout: fixed; border-collapse: collapse; border-spacing: 0; width: 100%; min-width: 640px; background-color: #DDEAFF;
table-layout: fixed; border-collapse: collapse; border-spacing: 0; width: 640px;
table-layout: fixed; border-collapse: collapse; border-spacing: 0; text-align: left; margin-top: 0; margin-right: auto; margin-bottom: 0; margin-left: auto;

img.style: width: auto; height: auto; max-width: 590px; max-height: 75px; display: inline-block; border-top-width: 0; border-right-width: 0; border-bottom-width: 0; border-left-width: 0;

table.style: table-layout: fixed; border-collapse: collapse; border-spacing: 0; border-radius: 4px; background-color: #FFFFFF;

td.style: mso-table-lspace: 0; mso-table-rspace: 0; padding-top: 0; padding-right: 0; padding-bottom: 0; padding-left: 0;

table.style: table-layout: fixed; border-collapse: collapse; border-spacing: 0; width: 100% !important; min-width: 100% !important; border-radius: 4px 4px; border-top-style: none; border-right-style: none; border-bottom-style: none; border-left-style: none; background-color: #FFFFFF;

td.style: height: 30px; line-height: 30px; margin-top: 0; margin-right: auto; margin-bottom: 0; margin-left: auto; padding-top: 0; padding-right: 30px; padding-bottom: 0; padding-left: 30px;

table.style: table-layout: fixed; border-collapse: collapse; border-spacing: 0; width: 100% !important; min-width: 100% !important; border-top-style: none; border-right-style: none; border-bottom-style: none; border-left-style: none; background-color: #FFFFFF;

h1.style: display: block; width: 100%; line-height: 1.5em; vertical-align: baseline; color: #333333; font-family: 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 20px; text-align: left; margin-top: 0; margin-right: 0; margin-bottom: 0.5em; margin-left: 0; padding-top: 0; padding-right: 0; padding-bottom: 0; padding-left: 0;
h1.strong: Loss of Health Insurance – Where to Find Help

p.style: vertical-align: baseline; line-height: 1.5em; color: #555555; font-family: 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 15px; text-align: left; unicode-bidi: embed; margin-top: 0; margin-right: 0; margin-bottom: 1.3em; margin-left: 0; padding-top: 0; padding-right: 0; padding-bottom: 0; padding-left: 0;
p.strong: Thousands of Arizonans are losing health insurance coverage or losing income and becoming AHCCCS, KidsCare and SNAP eligible.

p.style: vertical-align: baseline; line-height: 1.5em; color: #555555; font-family: 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 15px; text-align: left; unicode-bidi: embed; margin-top: 0; margin-right: 0; margin-bottom: 1.3em; margin-left: 0; padding-top: 0; padding-right: 0; padding-bottom: 0; padding-left: 0;

span.p: • AHCCCS and KidsCare are open for enrollment year around. Eligibility is based on income, not assets. Thousands of Arizona’s are eligible but have not tried to enroll. If a family’s income has been reduced, they may now be eligible.

p.style: vertical-align: baseline; line-height: 1.5em; color: #555555; font-family: 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 15px; text-align: left; unicode-bidi: embed; margin-top: 0; margin-right: 0; margin-bottom: 1.3em; margin-left: 0; padding-top: 0; padding-right: 0; padding-bottom: 0; padding-left: 0;

span.p: • The same application for AHCCCS and KidsCare can also be used for Supplemental Nutrition Assistance (SNAP - formerly Food Stamps), and cash assistance, Temporary Assistance for Needy Families (TANF).

p.style: vertical-align: baseline; line-height: 1.5em; color: #555555; font-family: 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 15px; text-align: left; unicode-bidi: embed; margin-top: 0; margin-right: 0; margin-bottom: 1.3em; margin-left: 0; padding-top: 0; padding-right: 0; padding-bottom: 0; padding-left: 0;

span.p: • The Health Insurance Marketplace grants Special Enrollment Periods for people who have lost their insurance coverage and for several other reasons. If you recently lost employer sponsored coverage you may be eligible to enroll, and if your income has fallen you may be qualified for financial assistance.

p.style: vertical-align: baseline; line-height: 1.5em; color: #555555; font-family: 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 15px; text-align: left; unicode-bidi: embed; margin-top: 0; margin-right: 0; margin-bottom: 1.3em; margin-left: 0; padding-top: 0; padding-right: 0; padding-bottom: 0; padding-left: 0;

span.p: No-cost help is available if consumers want to see if they are eligible for AHCCCS, KidsCare, SNAP or coverage from HealthCare.gov.

p.style: vertical-align: baseline; line-height: 1.5em; color: #555555; font-family: 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 15px; text-align: left; unicode-bidi: embed; margin-top: 0; margin-right: 0; margin-bottom: 1.3em; margin-left: 0; padding-top: 0; padding-right: 0; padding-bottom: 0; padding-left: 0;

span.p: • Contact Cover Arizona at 800.377.3536 or go to www.coveraz.org/connector to ask questions or to make an appointment. Bilingual Certified Application Assisters are available to help you over the phone, you may not need to meet in-person. We can help with Medicaid as well as the Health Insurance Marketplace and seeking a Special Enrollment Period (SEP).

p.style: vertical-align: baseline; line-height: 1.5em; color: #555555; font-family: 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 15px; text-align: left; unicode-bidi: embed; margin-top: 0; margin-right: 0; margin-bottom: 1.3em; margin-left: 0; padding-top: 0; padding-right: 0; padding-bottom: 0; padding-left: 0;

span.p: • All Federally Qualified Health Centers across Arizona can help with enrollment and primary care. In someone is uninsured, they may qualify for a sliding-fee. Go to https://www.aachc.org/communityhealthcenters/map/ and enter your zip code to find your nearest Community Health Center and call them to arrange for help with applications.

p.style: vertical-align: baseline; line-height: 1.5em; color: #555555; font-family: 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 15px; text-align: left; unicode-bidi: embed; margin-top: 0; margin-right: 0; margin-bottom: 1.3em; margin-left: 0; padding-top: 0; padding-right: 0; padding-bottom: 0; padding-left: 0;
p.em: We are trying to reach school administrators with important information about how school employees and students’ families can access no-cost help for no-cost and low-cost health insurance and SNAP benefits.

p.style: vertical-align: baseline; line-height: 1.5em; color: #555555; font-family: 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 15px; text-align: left; unicode-bidi: embed; margin-top: 0; margin-right: 0; margin-bottom: 1.3em; margin-left: 0; padding-top: 0; padding-right: 0; padding-bottom: 0; padding-left: 0;

span.p: For More Information: Allen Gjersvig, Director Outreach and Enrollment

p.style: vertical-align: baseline; line-height: 1.5em; color: #555555; font-family: 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 15px; text-align: left; unicode-bidi: embed; margin-top: 0; margin-right: 0; margin-bottom: 1.3em; margin-left: 0; padding-top: 0; padding-right: 0; padding-bottom: 0; padding-left: 0;

span.p: Arizona Alliance for Community Health Centers

p.style: vertical-align: baseline; line-height: 1.5em; color: #555555; font-family: 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 15px; text-align: left; unicode-bidi: embed; margin-top: 0; margin-right: 0; margin-bottom: 1.3em; margin-left: 0; padding-top: 0; padding-right: 0; padding-bottom: 0; padding-left: 0;

table.style: table-layout: fixed; border-collapse: collapse; border-spacing: 0; width: 100% !important; min-width: 100% !important; border-top-style: none; border-right-style: none; border-bottom-style: none; border-left-style: none; background-color: #FFFFFF;

td.style: height: 10px; line-height: 10px; margin-top: 0; margin-right: auto; margin-bottom: 0; margin-left: auto; padding-top: 0; padding-right: 10px; padding-bottom: 0; padding-left: 10px;

table.style: table-layout: fixed; border-collapse: collapse; border-spacing: 0; width: 100% !important; min-width: 100% !important; border-radius: 0 0 3px 3px; border-top-style: none; border-right-style: none; border-bottom-style: none; border-left-style: none; background-color: #FFFFFF;

td.style: color: #999999; font-family: 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 13px; mso-table-lspace: 0; mso-table-rspace: 0; width: 100%; border-radius: 0px 0px 3px 3px; text-align: center; padding-top: 15px; padding-right: 30px; padding-bottom: 15px; padding-left: 30px; background-color: #EBF2FF;

p.style: color: #999999; font-family: 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 13px; text-align: center; unicode-bidi: embed; margin-top: 10px; margin-right: 0; margin-bottom: 10px; margin-left: 0;

td.p: ©2020 Arizona School Administrators | 1910 W Washington Street, Phoenix, AZ 85009

table.style: table-layout: fixed; border-collapse: collapse; border-spacing: 0; width: 590px; margin-top: 0; margin-right: auto; margin-bottom: 0; margin-left: auto;

table-layout: fixed; border-collapse: collapse; border-spacing: 0; width: 100% !important; min-width: 100% !important; border-top-style: none; border-right-style: none; border-bottom-style: none; border-left-style: none;

a.style: text-decoration: none; display: inline-block; white-space: nowrap; margin-right: 2px; border-radius: 12px; color: #002d77; margin-bottom: 10px; font-family: Helvetica Neue, Helvetica, Arial, Verdana, sans-serif; font-size: 13px; font-weight: normal; line-height: 165%; width: auto; -webkit-text-size-adjust: none; text-align: left; direction: ltr; padding-top: 0; padding-right: 7px; padding-bottom: 0; padding-left: 7px; background-color: #669df7;
a.title: Web Version

a.style: text-decoration: none; display: inline-block; white-space: nowrap; margin-right: 2px; border-radius: 12px; color: #002d77; margin-bottom: 10px; font-family: Helvetica Neue, Helvetica, Arial, Verdana, sans-serif; font-size: 13px; font-weight: normal; line-height: 165%; width: auto; -webkit-text-size-adjust: none; text-align: left; direction: ltr; padding-top: 0; padding-right: 7px; padding-bottom: 0; padding-left: 7px; background-color: #669df7;
a.title: Forward

a.style: text-decoration: none; display: inline-block; white-space: nowrap; margin-right: 2px; border-radius: 12px; color: #002d77; margin-bottom: 10px; font-family: Helvetica Neue, Helvetica, Arial, Verdana, sans-serif; font-size: 13px; font-weight: normal; line-height: 165%; width: auto; -webkit-text-size-adjust: none; text-align: left; direction: ltr; padding-top: 0; padding-right: 7px; padding-bottom: 0; padding-left: 7px; background-color: #669df7;
a.title: Unsubscribe

table.style: table-layout: fixed; border-collapse: collapse; border-spacing: 0; margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto; width: 590px;

td.style: text-align: center; color: #999999; font-family: 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 13px;

table.style: table-layout: fixed; border-collapse: collapse; border-spacing: 0; text-align: center; font-size: 11px; font-weight: normal; white-space: nowrap; -webkit-text-size-adjust: none; background-image: none !important; width: 100%;

td.style: text-align: center; color: #999999; font-family: 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 13px; width: 100%; padding-top: 20px;

a.style: text-decoration: none; color: #999999; font-family: 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 13px; display: block; padding-bottom: 20px;
